name: The Price We Pay
description:
In The Price We Pay you can see and play as a male chick that was born just 24 hours ago. Since you are no more useful than a sack of meat (due to the fact that you don't lay eggs) you're put as soon as possible on a conveyor belt with only one direction available: death.

In this game your goal is to survive as long as possible without falling into the meat grinder.

This game was made as a project at Saxion University of Applied Sciences.
